Module Manager is under a CC share-alike license.
The version distributed here is maintained by Youen (neuoy) here: https://github.com/neuoy/ModuleManager
It is based on the version maintained by sarbian here: https://github.com/sarbian/ModuleManager (only the Nyan Cat loading screen has been removed)
It is based on the original mod from ialdabaoth, see his forum thread here : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/31342
